verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: WASHINGTON] – [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: this morning] [ARG1: he wo n't be meeting with Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-PRD: issuing a letter that mixed diplomacy with bravado] .
